Is it true that Verus does not allow its currency to be used as a reserve in a multi-reserve liquidity basket AMM token?
No, that's not true. According to the information, the Verus currency itself can be used as one of the reserves in another multi-reserve liquidity basket AMM token on Verus.

serve currency itself can also be used as one of the reserves in another multi-reserve liquidity basket AMM token on Verus.
